relevant_findings.findings: Necrosis of the distal right second toe and right hallux with absent right posterior tibial and dorsalis pulses.
Second to fifth distal phalanges underwent autoamputation; right hallux required transphalangeal amputation.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Distal phalanges underwent autoamputation over the 4-week period, and the right hallux subsequently required further amputation.

relevant_findings.findings: Achieved virological suppression on HAART with CD4 counts in excess of 600 cells/mm3.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in immune status with virological suppression achieved through HAART.
